abstract: Remember all that money that Citigroup made on subprime mortgage-related securities in the last several years? Well, it appears that a memory is all that’s left.
lead_paragraph: Remember all that money that Citigroup made on subprime mortgage-related securities in the last several years? Well, it appears that a memory is all that’s left.

headline.main: Citi Says Subprime Was a Net Loser
